name: openchangelog
description: OpenChangelog is a web-based tool to track and publish changelogs for software projects. It supports version tagging, team collaboration, and markdown-based entry submissions in a self-hosted UI.
features: Version tracking: Organize changelog entries by release version with automatic sorting and chronological display.
Markdown support: Write changelog entries using markdown formatting for rich text and code examples.
Team collaboration: Allow multiple team members to draft, review, and publish changelog entries together.
Public pages: Generate shareable changelog pages for users to view product updates and release history.
Entry categories: Tag changes as features, fixes, improvements, or breaking changes for clear communication.
Draft management: Save unpublished entries and schedule releases before making them visible to users.
API integration: Automate changelog updates from CI/CD pipelines or version control systems using REST endpoints.
Custom branding: Customize the appearance of public changelog pages to match your product's design and identity.
